mapper.select: SELECT /* CsMvotTypCd.getCsTransferTypeCodeList */ CS_MVOT_TYP_NO , CS_MVOT_TYP_NM , CS_TYP_DESC , TMPL_MEMO , USE_YN FROM CS_MVOT_TYP_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.sql: SELECT /* csMvotTypCd.transferTypeList */ CS_MVOT_TYP_NO , CS_MVOT_TYP_NM , CS_TYP_DESC , TMPL_MEMO , CASE WHEN TMPL_MEMO IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN TMPL_MEMO = '' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS TMPL_MEMO_YN , USE_YN , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM CS_MVOT_TYP_CD WHERE USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} || '%' ORDER BY CS_MVOT_TYP_NM
mapper.select: SELECT /* csMvotTypCd.checkCsMvotTypNm */ COUNT(CS_MVOT_TYP_NM) FROM CS_MVOT_TYP_CD WHERE CS_MVOT_TYP_NM = #{csMvotTypNm}
